message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a product for $100. I've sold 1 out of 2 products so far, and 0 of them have been high-quality. I'm not sure what you think about my products, but I'm willing to take the risk and offer you this one. Would you like to take a chance?
I'm taking a chance on this product.

Would you like to take a chance on this one? Keep in mind that the probability of it being high-quality is still 33.33%, but I'm not feeling very confident about it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Given the statistics and your concerns, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity. I'll look forward to seeing more information in the future.

I'll take the risk and buy the product.
